snippet: The undefeated American boxer Timothy Bradley scored a controversial upset over Manny Pacquiao of the Philippines on Saturday night in Las Vegas, winning a split decision that brought Pac-Man's Filipino fans, celebrity supporters and even other...
abstract: The undefeated American boxer Timothy Bradley scored a controversial upset over Manny Pacquiao of the Philippines on Saturday night in Las Vegas, winning a split decision that brought Pac-Man's Filipino fans, celebrity supporters and even other boxers onto Twitter to register their deep outrage.

headline.main: From Las Vegas to the Philippines, Shock Over Pacquiao Loss
